title: (x) YouWorkForThem - Bell Centennial Sub-Caption {F
content:
Can anyone identify the text font used on the cover of this project:   
 [http://youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=P0033](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102091628/http:/youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=P0033)   
   
Is it the unreleased Amplitude by Christian Schwartz?   
 [http://www.orangeitalic.com/fonts/amplitude.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102091628/http:/www.orangeitalic.com/fonts/amplitude.shtml)   
   
It's very nice...

 [‹ Mustang GT](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102091628/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10892 "Go to previous forum topic") [Jack Daniels Font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102091628/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10902 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: anyway, the secondary texts look like helvetica.

Or... Bell Centennial by Mathew Carter (?)   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/bell-centennial/sub-caption/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102091628/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/bell-centennial/sub-caption/)

hmm, i didn't notice that there was a zoomed-in picture of it.   
it's still hard to see the font, but yes, it looks more like bell centennial.
